location_name: Svět Medúz - the largest jellyfisharium in Europe
location_short_descr: Discover a unique exhibition from the world of marine animals - Svět Medúz meduzarium, where you will find 10,000...
location_long_descr:
On the roof of OC Arkády Pankrác in Prague 4, you will discover a unique exhibition from the world of marine animals - it is the Svět Medúz meduzarium, where you will find more than 10,000 jellyfish of various species, shapes and sizes in 38 aquariums.
Turritopsis dohrnii is one of the most remarkable species in the Pankráck medusarium . These jellyfish are able to influence their life cycle and return from the adult jellyfish stage to the polyp stage.
Svet Meduz is complemented by audio- visual effects and for children there is an interactive aquarium and a children's corner.
